features.name: CSV Upload & Processing
features.description: Accept CSV file uploads and process tabular data
features.user_story: As a data scientist, I want to upload my CSV dataset so that I can generate synthetic data from it

features.name: Synthetic Data Generation
features.description: Generate synthetic tabular data preserving statistical properties
features.user_story: As a user, I want to generate synthetic data that maintains the statistical characteristics of my original dataset

features.name: Quality Report Generation
features.description: Generate basic quality metrics comparing real vs synthetic data
features.user_story: As a user, I want to see quality metrics to understand how well the synthetic data matches my original data

features.name: Demo Model Training
features.description: Train models on real vs synthetic data and compare performance
features.user_story: As a user, I want to see how models perform on synthetic vs real data to validate utility

features.name: API Endpoints
features.description: RESTful API for data generation and model training
features.user_story: As a developer, I want API endpoints so I can integrate synthetic data generation into my workflow

features.name: Advanced Statistical Metrics
features.user_story: As a data scientist, I want detailed statistical validation to ensure data quality

features.name: Multiple Data Types Support
features.description: Enhanced support for datetime, categorical, and mixed data types
features.user_story: As a user, I want to generate synthetic data for complex datasets with various data types

features.name: Basic Web UI
features.description: Simple web interface for file upload and result viewing
features.user_story: As a non-technical user, I want a web interface to easily generate synthetic data

features.name: Data Privacy Controls
features.user_story: As a compliance officer, I want privacy controls to ensure synthetic data meets regulations

features.name: Batch Processing
features.description: Process multiple datasets in batch mode
features.user_story: As a power user, I want to process multiple datasets at once to save time

features.name: Advanced ML Models
features.description: GANs, VAEs, and other sophisticated generation methods
features.user_story: As a researcher, I want state-of-the-art generation methods for highest quality synthetic data

features.name: Enterprise SSO Integration
features.description: SAML, OAuth, and enterprise authentication systems
features.user_story: As an enterprise user, I want to use my company's authentication system
